name: @fav/prop.list-own-symbols
description: Lists enumerable and unenumerable own property symbols of an object.

scripts.web:build: npm run web:build-src && npm run web:build-test
scripts.web:build-src: browserify index.js --standalone fav.prop.list-own-symbols -o web/fav.prop.list-own-symbols.js && cd web && uglifyjs fav.prop.list-own-symbols.js --compress --mangle -o fav.prop.list-own-symbols.min.js --source-map url=fav.prop.list-own-symbols.min.js.map
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run coverage && npm run web:build

author: Takayuki Sato
